summary: This is a spell that paralyzes people and makes the fly backwards that can be found in Whiterun market well
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a spell and an NPC to the world. The NPC can be found at the skyforge and it gives you a taster of how annoying it is to have the spell done to you :)


What does the spell do?

This is a spell that when casted on a creature it makes them fly backwards while paralyzed. It works best on humans. It doesn't use any magica and doesn't do any damage, unless you push someone off something :) .

TIP it works best from very close range, if you do it very close they fly up and back

Where do I get it?

The spell can be found on the well in Whiterun market
If it's not there it might be floating above the well

If that doesn't work use console commands.

1. help Maakis
2. player.addspell (code it says next to Maakis form help)


If you have any questions add me on steam Hoshi and send me a message. You can find the mod the steam workshop as well
author: Hoshi
